movies.title: Mobile Suit Z Gundam: A New Translation - Heirs to the Stars
movies.originalTitle: Kidô senshi Z Gandamu: Hoshi o tsugu mono
movies.plot: 10 years after the One Year War Camille Bidan becomes involved in the conflict against the Titans as the pilot of Zeta Gundam.
movies.simplePlot: 10 years after the One Year War Camille Bidan becomes involved in the conflict against the Titans as the pilot of Zeta Gundam.

biography.bio: Toshio Furukawa was born on July 16, 1946 in Tochigi, Japan. He is an actor, known for Lamu (1981), Dragon Ball Z (1989) and Dragon Ball Z Kai (2009). He is married to Shino Kakinuma.
biography.name: Toshio Furukawa

biography.bio: Tôru Furuya was born on July 31, 1953 in Isogo-ku, Yokohama, Kanagawa, Japan. He is an actor, known for Les chevaliers du zodiaque (1986), Paprika (2006) and Dragon Ball Z (1989). He has been married to Satomi Majima since 1985. They have one child. He was previously married to Mami Koyama.
biography.name: Tôru Furuya

biography.bio: Kazuhiko Inoue was born on March 26, 1954 in Yokohama, Japan. He is an actor, known for Naruto: Shippûden (2007), Naruto (2002) and Beast King GoLion (1981).
biography.name: Kazuhiko Inoue

biography.bio: Masako Katsuki was born on October 15, 1959 in Hachinohe, Japan as Masako Shiono. She is an actress, known for Naruto: Shippûden (2007), Naruto (2002) and Appleseed (1988).
biography.name: Masako Katsuki

biography.bio: Maya Okamoto was born on February 3, 1967 in Tokyo, Japan. She is an actress, known for Silent Möbius (1998), Burn Up W (1996) and Grey Digital Target (1986).
biography.name: Maya Okamoto

biography.bio: Bin Shimada was born on November 20, 1954 in Nigata, Japan. He is known for his work on Dragon Ball Z: Broly - The Legendary Super Saiyan (1993), Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind (1984) and Trigun: Badlands Rumble (2010).
biography.name: Bin Shimada

biography.bio: Hirotaka Suzuoki was born on March 6, 1950 in Nagoya, Japan. He was an actor, known for Les chevaliers du zodiaque (1986), Dragon Ball Z (1989) and Millennium Actress (2001). He died on August 6, 2006 in Tokyo, Japan.
biography.name: Hirotaka Suzuoki

biography.bio: Nobuo Tobita was born on November 6, 1959 in Mito, Japan. He is an actor, known for Naruto: Shippûden (2007), Ocean Waves (1993) and Cowboy Bebop: The Movie (2001).
biography.name: Nobuo Tobita
